title: 11/17/21: Change of presentation and new functionality in the timesheets
content: Emprez offers you a new presentation and a new functionality in the timesheets:1 - New design for the timesheet editing windowEmprez has streamlined the layout of the window that appears when you want to edit a timesheet.Simply navigate from one tab to another to access the hours worked, meals, or break(s).2 - Show or hide the approved timesheetsYou can choose whether or not to show the already approved timesheets by checking/unchecking the "Include already approved TS" box, then clicking on "Load".Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
